CompleteSnapshot.name: CompleteSnapshot
CompleteSnapshot.description:
Grants permission to seal and complete the snapshot after all of the required blocks
                                                of data have been written to it.

GetSnapshotBlock.name: GetSnapshotBlock
GetSnapshotBlock.description:
Grants permission to return the data of a block in an Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS)
                                                snapshot

ListChangedBlocks.name: ListChangedBlocks
ListChangedBlocks.description:
Grants permission to list the blocks that are different between two Amazon Elastic
                                                Block Store (EBS) snapshots of the same volume/snapshot lineage

ListSnapshotBlocks.name: ListSnapshotBlocks
ListSnapshotBlocks.description: Grants permission to list the blocks in an Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) snapshot.

PutSnapshotBlock.name: PutSnapshotBlock
PutSnapshotBlock.description:
Grants permission to write a block of data to a snapshot created by the StartSnapshot
                                                operation.

StartSnapshot.name: StartSnapshot
StartSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a new EBS snapshot.
